body_html:
@apaszke
I installed from source the autograd branch and I can confirm that the bug is fixed on it.
Initial memory usage is only half of the initial memory usage in the master branch and it remains stable through the loops.

Looking forward to it!

body:
@apaszke 
I installed from source the `autograd` branch and I can confirm that the bug is fixed on it.
Initial memory usage is only half of the initial memory usage in the master branch and it remains stable through the loops.

Looking forward to it!
